title: I can't login to support.riotgames.com! But I can to na.leagueoflegends.com
body:
Hi Riot, 
I'm trying to submit a ticket to the the player support website but it says "Sorry, we couldn't find that combination of username, password, and region". Any idea why? I can login onto the Boards normally. What's going on? Please check this out for me Riot thanks!

replies.body:
I want you to make sure you're trying to sign in to the correct Region first. If that doesn't work then you can try clearing your cache/cookies, or even try a different browser. LAST ATTEMPT, if all of those fail, try going into incognito mode and sign in from there. 

You can reach out to me if none of those steps work for you!

Yep..none of them work. Tried safari, chrome, firefox. Incognito mode too for chrome. Cleared cache and cookies. I submitted a ticket to support without logging in asking about this but i don't have a response yet. I can't check the ticket either because I need to login to view.
